contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 5, 1933 D Douglas (Lanarkshire) Contest
Douglas (Lanarkshire) Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
douglas-lanarkshire-contest
None
Douglas, South Lanarkshire, Scotland, UK
Prizes - 1st £10 and trophy, 2nd £6, 3rd £3. Best 3rd section band(£3 and shield) - Croy Parish. Best 4th section band - Bannockburn Colliery. March contest - 1st Glasgow Corporation as Dept, 2nd Douglas Colliery. Best cornet - R.Reynolds (Croy) Best euphonium - T.Keith (Glasgow Gas). Best trombone - George Kerr (Coalburn). Best basses - Douglas Colliery, 7 bands competed.
Oct. 23, 2013, 11:37 a.m. Oct. 23, 2013, 11:47 a.m.
1 Bellshill & District Concert Brass Herbert Bennett
2 Coalburn Silver Band John Faulds
3 Croy Silver Band Robert Thomson
4 Bannockburn Colliery James Currie
Unknown Result Douglas Colliery Gregor Grant
